p: Genomic DNA from approximately 100 mg SAT and VAT was isolated using the Qiagen DNeasy Blood & Tissue Kit (Qiagen, Valencia, USA) as per the manufacturer’s instructions. DNA purity and quantity were assessed using the Nanodrop Spectrophotometer (Nanodrop™ One, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, USA) and Qubit fluorometer (Life Technologies, CA, USA), respectively.
